attributes.additional_details: Alot of pets like dog , cats and horses are seriously affected with the noise. The noise scares them. Many animals have to be put down as they can put their life at risk. Many horses have ended up being put down because of them injuring themselves badly. Not just animals are affected but some veterans are really affect because of war and if they hear the bangs it cause PTSD or shell shock
attributes.background: I want parliament to make fireworks slient

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Make it illegal to sell, buy and use fireworks other than silent ones - https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700223
